00042 #ifndef PIZ_ITEMSET128_H
00043 #define PIZ_ITEMSET128_H

00045 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00058 /**
00059  * \def     PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE 
00060  * \brief   Number of bits in the bit field.
00061  * \ingroup itemset128
00062  */
00063  
00064 #define PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE 128
00065 
00066 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 
00069 #define PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG    32
00070 #define PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS    4
00071 
00072 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 
00075 /**
00076  * \ingroup itemset128 
00077  */
00078 typedef struct _PIZItemset128 {
00079     unsigned long items[4];                             /* 128 Bits field as 4 longs */
00080     } PIZItemset128;
00081     
00082 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 
00085 PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE
00086 
00087 /**
00088  * \brief   At specified index, set/let the bit to 1.
00089  * \param   itemset A valid pointer.
00090  * \param   index The index (zero-based).
00091  * \warning For efficiency the index is NOT checked ; so crash may occur with invalid indexing.
00092  * \ingroup itemset128
00093  */
00094 void pizItemset128SetAtIndex (PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index);
00095 
00096 /**
00097  * \brief   At specified index, set/let the bit to 0.
00098  * \param   itemset A valid pointer.
00099  * \param   index The index (zero-based).
00100  * \warning For efficiency the index is NOT checked ; so crash may occur with invalid indexing.
00101  * \ingroup itemset128
00102  */
00103 void pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index);
00104 
00105 /**
00106  * \brief   Set/let all bits to 0.
00107  * \param   itemset A valid pointer.
00108  * \ingroup itemset128
00109  */
00110 void pizItemset128Clear (PIZItemset128 *itemset);
00111 
00112 /**
00113  * \brief   Get the number of set bits.
00114  * \param   itemset A valid pointer.
00115  * \return  The number of set bits.
00116  * \ingroup itemset128
00117  */
00118 long pizItemset128Count (const PIZItemset128 *itemset);
00119 
00120 /**
00121  * \brief   At specified index, get the value of a bit.
00122  * \param   itemset A valid pointer.
00123  * \param   index The index (zero-based).
00124  * \return  True if set, otherwise false.
00125  * \warning For efficiency the index is NOT checked ; so crash may occur with invalid indexing.
00126  * \ingroup itemset128
00127  */
00128 bool pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex  (const PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index);
00129 
00130 /**
00131  * \brief   Compute union between two bit fields.
00132  * \details r = a | b.
00133  * \param   a A valid pointer.
00134  * \param   b A valid pointer.
00135  * \param   r A valid pointer.
00136  * \ingroup itemset128
00137  */
00138 void pizItemset128Union (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b, PIZItemset128 *r);
00139 
00140 /**
00141  * \brief   Compute intersection between two bit fields.
00142  * \details r = a & b.
00143  * \param   a A valid pointer.
00144  * \param   b A valid pointer.
00145  * \param   r A valid pointer.
00146  * \ingroup itemset128
00147  */
00148 void pizItemset128Intersection (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b, PIZItemset128 *r);
00149 
00150 /**
00151  * \brief   Test if the bit field \a a is included in the bit field \a b.
00152  * \param   a A valid pointer.
00153  * \param   b A valid pointer.
00154  * \return  True if included, otherwise false.
00155  * \ingroup itemset128
00156  */
00157 bool pizItemset128IsIncluded (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b);
00158 
00159 /**
00160  * \brief   Test if the bit field \a a is equal to the bit field \a b.
00161  * \param   a A valid pointer.
00162  * \param   b A valid pointer.
00163  * \return  True if equal, otherwise false.
00164  * \ingroup itemset128
00165  */
00166 bool pizItemset128IsEqual (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b);

00173 #ifdef PIZ_EXTERN_INLINE
00174 
00175 PIZ_EXTERN void pizItemset128SetAtIndex (PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index)
00176 {
00177     long i, p, m;
00178     
00179     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00180     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00181     
00182     m = 1 << p;
00183     
00184     itemset->items[i] |= m;
00185 }
00186 
00187 PIZ_EXTERN void pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index) 
00188 {
00189     long i, p, m;
00190     
00191     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00192     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00193     
00194     m = 1 << p;
00195     
00196     itemset->items[i] &= ~m;
00197 }
00198 
00199 PIZ_EXTERN void pizItemset128Clear (PIZItemset128 *itemset)  
00200 {
00201     long i;
00202     
00203     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00204         itemset->items[i] = 0;
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 PIZ_EXTERN long pizItemset128Count (const PIZItemset128 *itemset)
00209 {
00210     long i;
00211     long k = 0;
00212     
00213     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00214         unsigned long n = itemset->items[i];
00215             
00216         while (n != 0) {
00217             k  += (n & 1);
00218             n >>= 1;
00219         }
00220     }
00221     
00222     return k;
00223 }
00224 
00225 PIZ_EXTERN bool pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (const PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index) 
00226 {
00227     unsigned long k = 0;
00228 
00229     long i, p;
00230 
00231     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00232     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00233     
00234     k = itemset->items[i];
00235 
00236     k >>= p;
00237     k  &= 1;
00238     
00239     return (k != 0);
00240 }
00241 
00242 PIZ_EXTERN void pizItemset128Union (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b, PIZItemset128 *r) 
00243 {
00244     long i;
00245     
00246     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00247         r->items[i] = a->items[i] | b->items[i];
00248     }
00249 }
00250 
00251 PIZ_EXTERN void pizItemset128Intersection (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b, PIZItemset128 *r) 
00252 {
00253     long i;
00254     
00255     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00256         r->items[i] = a->items[i] & b->items[i];
00257     }
00258 }
00259 
00260 PIZ_EXTERN bool pizItemset128IsIncluded (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b)
00261 {
00262     long i;
00263     bool k = true;
00264             
00265     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00266         if (b->items[i] != (b->items[i] | a->items[i])) {
00267             k = false;
00268             break;
00269         }
00270     }
00271         
00272     return k;
00273 }
00274 
00275 PIZ_EXTERN bool pizItemset128IsEqual (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b)
00276 {
00277     long i;
00278     long k = true;
00279             
00280     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00281         if (a->items[i] != b->items[i]) {
00282             k = false;
00283             break;
00284         }
00285     }
00286         
00287     return k;
00288 }
00289 
00290 #endif // PIZ_EXTERN_INLINE
